message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think 60/40 is a bit biased, how about we meet in the middle?
Bob, my turn to call for fairness.  Let's do 55/45, considering the time pressure.
Time pressure affects you more than me, so I'll take a bit more. Think about the inflation!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now. 52/48, take it or leave it.
You're losing value fast, I can wait. My turn to be firm, 60/40 is my offer now.
Okay, Bob, you're right, the clock is ticking. I'll take 48, you take 52. Let's be done with this.
